::DarkMouse/KitKat:;

KitKat:;
She ducked and rolled to avoid the hail of bullets.  She transformed 
into bot mode and returned fire.

DarkMouse:;
She was hit in the arm and dropped her rifle.  She picked it up and 
looked through the scope.  She aimed at Adrax and fired.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
> OOC: I hate to do this....but I really dont want to see my old base 
> destroyed. And, I know Ive been out of it, so if this is wrong in 
any way 
> please let me know.
> 
>     Adrax looked down on the bots gathering around the base he only 
> remembered as Hell Beast's. He scanned them, he knew one of them as 
Megatron.
>     Still in beast mode, he opened his mouth and his gapling gun 
extended. 
> Adrax then let it rain bullets from the sky towrds Megatron and his 
commrads.
